document_data.name: Circle of Darkness
document_data.mainbody: The '''Circle of Darkness''' was a small temple dedicated to [[Cyric]], the Dark Sun, in [[Zhentil Keep]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was led by High Priest [[Maskul Mirrormane]] and his cadre of clergymen. Given the predominant worship of [[Bane]] in Zhentil Keep at the time, the Circle of Darkness had only attracted a handful of loyal believers by 1358.
